00027 //
00028 // *** check that the file system exists and that there
00029 // *** is enough disk space
00030 //
00031 bool StreamService::checkFileSystem() const
00032 {
00033   struct statfs64 buf;
00034   int retVal = statfs64(filePath_.c_str(), &buf);
00035   if(retVal!=0)
00036     {
00037       std::cout << "StreamService: " << "Could not stat output filesystem for path " 
00038     << filePath_ << std::endl;
00039       return false;
00040     }
00041   
00042   unsigned int btotal = 0;
00043   unsigned int bfree = 0;
00044   unsigned int blksize = 0;
00045   if(retVal==0)
00046     {
00047       blksize = buf.f_bsize;
00048       btotal = buf.f_blocks;
00049       bfree  = buf.f_bfree;
00050     }
00051   double dfree = double(bfree)/double(btotal);
00052   double dusage = 1. - dfree;
00053 
00054   if(dusage>highWaterMark_)
00055     {
00056       cout << "StreamService: " << "Output filesystem for path " << filePath_ 
00057      << " is more than " << highWaterMark_*100 << "% full " << endl;
00058       return false;
00059     }
00060 
00061   return true;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 //
00066 // *** file private data member from parameter set
00067 //
00068 void StreamService::setStreamParameter()
00069 {
00070   // some parameters common to streams are given in the XML file
00071   // these are defaults, actually set at configure time
00072 
00073   // 02-Sep-2008, KAB:  NOTE that most, if not all, of these parameters are
00074   // overwritten with either defaults from stor::Parameter or values set 
00075   // in the SM configuration (confdb/online or xml/offline).
00076   // The overwrite from the Parameter class happens in ServiceManager::manageInitMsg.
00077 
00078   streamLabel_        = parameterSet_.getParameter<string> ("streamLabel");
00079   maxSize_ = 1048576 * (long long) parameterSet_.getParameter<int> ("maxSize");
00080   fileName_           = ""; // set by setFileName
00081   filePath_           = ""; // set by setFilePath
00082   setupLabel_         = ""; // set by setSetupLabel
00083   highWaterMark_      = 0.9;// set by setHighWaterMark
00084   lumiSectionTimeOut_ = 45; // set by setLumiSectionTimeOut
00085   sourceId_           = ""; // set by setSourceId
00086   // report(cout, 4);
00087 }

00090 //
00091 // *** get all files in this run (including open files)
00092 // return for each the count, filename, number of events, file size separated by a space
00093 //
00094 std::list<std::string> StreamService::getFileList()
00095 {
00096   boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(list_lock_);
00097 
00098   std::list<std::string> files_=outputSummaryClosed_;
00099   for (OutputMapIterator it = outputMap_.begin() ; it != outputMap_.end(); ++it) {
00100     std::ostringstream entry;
00101     entry << it->first->fileCounter() << " " 
00102           << it->first->completeFileName() << " " 
00103           << it->first->events() << " "
00104           << it->first->fileSize();
00105     files_.push_back(entry.str());
00106   }
00107 
00108   return files_;
00109 }
00110 
00111 //
00112 // *** Copy file string from OutputMap into OutputMapClosed
00113 //
00114 void StreamService::fillOutputSummaryClosed(const boost::shared_ptr<FileRecord> &file)
00115 {
00116   boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(list_lock_);
00117 
00118   std::ostringstream entry;
00119   entry << file->fileCounter() << " " 
00120         << file->completeFileName() << " " 
00121         << file->events() << " "
00122         << file->fileSize();
00123   outputSummaryClosed_.push_back(entry.str());
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 //
00128 // *** get all open (current) files
00129 //
00130 std::list<std::string> StreamService::getCurrentFileList()
00131 {
00132   std::list<std::string> files_;
00133   for (OutputMapIterator it = outputMap_.begin(), itEnd = outputMap_.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00134     files_.push_back(it->first->completeFileName());
00135   }
00136   return files_;
00137 }

00139 //
00140 // *** override maxSize from cfg if xdaq parameter was set 
00141 //
00142 void StreamService::setMaxFileSize(int x)
00143 {
00144   maxFileSizeInMB_ = x;
00145   if(maxFileSizeInMB_ > 0)
00146     maxSize_ = 1048576 * (long long) maxFileSizeInMB_;
00147 }
00148 
00149 //
00150 // *** get the current time
00151 //
00152 double StreamService::getCurrentTime() const
00153 {
00154   struct timeval now;
00155   struct timezone dummyTZ;
00156   gettimeofday(&now, &dummyTZ);
00157   return ((double) now.tv_sec + ((double) now.tv_usec / 1000000.0));
00158 }
